dct_title_s: A new map of the terraqueous globe according to the ancient discoveries and most general divisions of it into continents and oceans
dct_description_sm: Double hemispherical map of the world with decorative border. Plate 1 from: A new set of maps both antient and present ..., Edward Wells, Oxford. 1700.
